lead_paragraph: Miami Marlins reliever Carter Capps was expected to contend for the closer's job this season. Instead won't throw a single pitch.

headline.print_headline: Marlins' Capps Out for Season Because of Tommy John Surgery
headline.main: Marlins' Capps Out for Season Because of Tommy John Surgery
